Description: The reopening of the Qatari embassy is an expression of solidarity with 'the Syrian people's revolution and a rejection of the Assad regime,' Doha said.

Title: UN pledges support for Syrians as new gov gains recognition
Description: As Syria attempts to move on from Assad's legacy, foreign countries and blocs are looking to establish early ties with the new transitional government.

Title: Gaza: Israel bombs another UN school as malnutrition cases soar
Description: Israel killed at least 20 in the latest bombing of a UN school where Palestinians were sheltering, while malnutrition cases soar due to the obstruction of aid.

Title: Morocco's former PM El-Othmani defends normalisation with Israel
Description: In October, PJD's new leadership reaffirmed its anti-normalisation stance and urged Othmani to apologise to the Moroccan people for his role in the accord.

Title: Gaza war death toll surpasses 45,000, Assad releases statement
Description: The death toll in the Gaza Strip has surpassed 45,000, after 14 months of Israel's war in the Palestinian enclave.

Title: Gaza war death toll surpasses 45,000, Israel strikes Syria
Description: The death toll in the Gaza Strip has surpassed 45,000, after 14 months of Israel's war in the Palestinian enclave.

Title: Israel strikes Syria, kills Palestinians across Gaza shelters
Description: Israel continues to strike several territories in the Middle East, targeting Syrian positions and Palestinians across the Gaza Strip.

Title: Israel strikes Syria, kills Palestinians in Khan Younis shelter
Description: Israel continues to strike several territories in the Middle East, targeting Syrian positions and Palestinians across the Gaza Strip.

Title: UN launches fresh attempt to resolve Libya's election impasse
Description: A UN-backed political process had previously been pushed when national elections were scheduled to be held in 2021, although they collapsed.

Title: Sudan paramilitary drone attack kills 38 people
Description: The Sudanese army and Rapid Support Forces have been clashing in the city of al-Fasher, the last government stronghold in Darfur.

Title: S. Korean opposition urges removal of impeached President Yoon
Description: South Korea's parliament voted on Saturday to remove Yoon from office after declaring martial law, suspending civilian rule, for hours.

Title: Israel approves plan aiming to double annexed Golan population
Description: The plan would see the use of 40 million shekels for 'demographic development' in the Golan Heights, the Israeli government announced.

Title: Syria sanctions relief premature for now, top EU official says
Description: Foreign ministers of the European Union convened in a meeting on Monday, with Kaha Kallas they would continue to send finical report through UN agencies.

Title: Israel files appeal against ICC warrants for Netanyahu, Gallant
Description: Israel filed two appeals, arguing serious procedural deficiencies in the ICC decision to seek arrest warrants for Netanyahu and Gallant.

Title: UK in contact with HTS rebel group in Syria: minister
Description: David Lammy said the group remains proscribed in the UK, however this does not block making contact.

Title: Israel kills Al Jazeera journalist in Gaza
Description: Israeli forces killed Al-Jazeera cameraman Ahmed al-Louh in a strike on the Nuseirat camp on Sunday.

Title: Israeli forces kill 22 in Gaza, attack shelter for displaced
Description: Israel's violence in the Gaza Strip continued on Sunday, killing over 20 people in the northern part of the territory.

Title: Top Israeli rabbi urges unemployed Israelis not to join military
Description: Rabbi Yitzhak Yosef has drawn harsh backlash after saying it is 'forbidden' to join the army, even for someone unemployed.

Title: Hamas says Israel 'deliberately bombed’ site to kill captives
Description: Hamas' armed wing revealed the Israeli army targeted a location where captives were present to 'ensure their death'.

Title: Key Libya oil refinery halts operations after clashes
Description: Several oil tanks in Zawiya were set ablaze after armed clashes broke out in the western Libyan city, prompting a halt in oil operations.

Title: Israel to close Ireland embassy over ICJ genocide petition
Description: Israel claims that Ireland has carried out what it described as 'anti-Israel policies', after a series of pro-Palestinian moves Dublin made.

Title: Israel says to close embassy in Ireland over 'extreme policies'
Description: Israel claims that Ireland has carried out what it described as 'anti-Israel policies', after a series of pro-Palestinian moves Dublin made.

Title: Clashes between PA forces and Jenin Brigades continue
Description: PA forces continued raids on Jenin as relatives of those killed by the security services took to the streets to rally against the crackdown.

Title: Syria: Students return to school one week after Assad fall
Description: Schools across several districts in Syria reopened on Sunday, in a sign of normalcy in the country that has been ravaged by 13-year-long civil war.

Title: Turkey 'ready' to provide military support to new Syria gov't
Description: Turkey said Syria's new government should be given a 'chance' on the world stage, stressing Ankara's readiness to provide military support if necessary.

Title: Experts warn of unexploded mines in Syria, urge de-mining effort
Description: The HALO Trust says there is an 'urgent' need to remove millions of lustre munitions, landmines and unexploded munitions in Syria as thousands return.

Title: Berlin warns Assad torturers against fleeing to Germany
Description: Germany's FM said Berlin would 'bring the regime’s henchmen to account' for their crimes 'with the full force of the law' should they flee to the country.

Title: Israel launches over 60 strikes on Syria, kills scores in Gaza
Description: Israel continues to wreck havoc in the region, launching over 60 overnight strikes in Syria and killing over a dozen Palestinians in war-hit Gaza.

Title: Israel launches over 60 strikes on Syria, kills scores in Gaza
